Notes.Note: Increase level cap for crafts Huntsman, Weaponsmith, and Artificer to 500.
Added new PoI to Divinity's Reach.
Added missing area Claw Island.
Kessex Hills has 14 hearts, not 17.
Updated PoIs and waypoints in Diessa Plateau, Snowden Drifts, and Wayfarer Foothills.
Fields of Ruin now has correct level range 30-40.
No longer mark loaded file as changed when loading certain legacy files.
Update waypoint count for Brisban Wildlands, Cursed Shore, Plains of Ashford, and Straits of Devastation.
Add story choice tracking (order, lesser race, etc.).
Removed external DLL dependency introduced in 0.1.7. Charrmander.exe now runs by itself again.
FotM tier input will not be empty when loading a character with no FotM tier data.
Dungeon story mode and FotM tier tracking.
Properly handles new version history file.
Sliders occasionally showed decimal values.
Up/down input controls for better usability.
Character and area reference lists include level and level range and are sortable. Shift+click to sort on multiple columns.
WvW and city areas have their level range changed from 1-80 to 0-80.
Added area completion overview for all named characters.
Added character level.
Crafting discipline and level sliders auto-size to consume window space greedily.
Version history log still might cut off on the right.
Snowden Drifts and Dredgehaunt Cliffs had typos.
Option to mark an area as completed, filling all items automatically. Also in context menu.
Indicate area completion status with icons in reference list.
Added a field for any personal notes the user wishes to record.
After deleting a character, if more remain in the list select the first one.
Update check performed automatically on startup.
Lion's Arch listed 223 points of interest. It has 23.
Crafting discipline icons show the discipline name in a tooltip.
Show area level ranges in a tooltip in the area reference list.
Biography choice "Ash Legion" appeared as "Ashin Legion."
Text in update history log occasionally cut off on the right.
Version history will no longer include unreleased update notes.
Added character creation biography choices.
First release.
Individual area completion tracking per character.
Crafting disciplines.
Drag & Drop open.
File type association.
Manual update check.
